dmca.title: inXile claims trademark infringement
dmca.body:
March 21, 2007
Sent via: FACSIMILE AND FIRST CLASS MAIL

Re: Copyright and Trademark Claim
Doman: lineriderfun.com
Our Reference No. 022069.0017US

Dear Gentlemen:

Enclosed is a copyright and trademark claim being submitted on behalf of our client, inXile Entertainment, Inc., ("inXile") the exclusive copyright licensee of [Private], and applicant for federal registration of the mark LINE RIDER in the United States. The claim has been signed by the Chief Executive Office of inXile.

The attached claim requests that the above-identified site be immediately shut down due to the fact that it infringed our clients trademark rights and copyrights. Please direct all correspondence concerning this matter to be undersigned. Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Sincerely,

RUTAN & TUCKET, LLP
[Private]
SJB
Enclosure
